issue.title: [R] Update python.Rmd vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13401](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13401). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Proposed changes:
 \* Add link to where reader can learn about the different Arrow object types (the "internals" section of the "arrow" vignette) e.g. by calling `vignette("arrow", package = "arrow")`
 \* "we" -> "you"
 \* Brief description of what a virtualenv is
 \* "The package" -> which package?
 \* Update example objects to have different names
 \* Add reasons why you might want to use pyarrow to a brief list at start of vignette
 \* Move sentence starting with "Send isn't the right word" to own subsection on how this works

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13401?focusedCommentId=17456511) by Nicola Crane (thisisnic):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11914
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11914>
